biotools.summary: Academic Resources Platform for COVID-19 The Academic Resources for COVID-19 (ARC) is an online platform to match equipment, consumables, reagents and other critical resources needed by Swiss diagnostic laboratories involved in combating the Sars-CoV-2 virus with Swiss academic groups who are able and willing to provide them.
